Question: Hyundai Engineering Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Hyundai Engineering Co., Ltd.

Product: Hydrogen Energy and Software-Defined Vehicle (SDV) Technologies at CES 2024

- Hyundai Motor Company showcased future technologies at CES 2024, including hydrogen and software-defined vehicle (SDV) and artificial intelligence (AI)-related technologies.
- The exhibition highlighted the transition to a hydrogen society, featuring HTWO Grid solution and technologies for hydrogen production, storage, and transportation.
- The company presented the new E/E architecture for SDV and core SDV technologies developed by 42dot, the Global Software Center of Hyundai Motor Group.
- The SDV technologies included HPVC and SDV OS, data-driven learning systems, safety-designed vehicle technology, large language models for advanced mobility, and self-managed smart city solutions.
- Hyundai Motor Group also showcased software-defined mobility services in motion, such as Shucle, TAP!, and Robotaxi, emphasizing customer-oriented mobility experiences.

For more information, visit: https://www.hyundai.com/worldwide/en/brand-journal/mobility-solution/ces-2024
Summary_cn:
现代工程公司

产品：2024年国际消费电子展（CES）上的氢能源和软件定义车辆（SDV）技术

- 现代汽车公司在2024年的CES上展示了未来技术，包括氢能源、软件定义车辆（SDV）和人工智能（AI）相关技术。
- 展会突出了向氢能社会的过渡，展示了HTWO Grid解决方案以及关于氢能源生产、储存和运输的技术。
- 公司展示了SDV的新电气/电子架构和现代汽车集团的全球软件中心42dot开发的核心SDV技术。
- SDV技术包括HPVC和SDV OS、数据驱动的学习系统、安全设计的车辆技术、用于先进移动性的大型语言模型以及自管理智能城市解决方案。
- 现代汽车集团还展示了运行中的软件定义移动服务，如Shucle、TAP!和Robotaxi，强调以客户为导向的移动体验。

如需更多信息，请访问：https://www.hyundai.com/worldwide/en/brand-journal/mobility-solution/ces-2024
